Moreover, when ye shall divide<S>5307</S> by lot the land<S>776</S> for inheritance<S>5159</S>, ye shall offer<S>7311</S> an oblation<S>8641</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, an holy portion<S>6944</S> of the land<S>776</S>: the length<S>753</S> shall be the length<S>753</S> of five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S> reeds, and the breadth<S>7341</S> shall be ten<S>6235</S> thousand<S>505</S>. This shall be holy<S>6944</S> in all the borders<S>1366</S> thereof round about<S>5439</S>. <sup>when: Heb. when ye cause the land to fall</sup> <sup>an holy: Heb. holiness</sup>
Of this there shall be for the sanctuary<S>6944</S> five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S> in length, with five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S> in breadth, square<S>7251</S> round about<S>5439</S>; and fifty<S>2572</S> cubits<S>520</S> round about<S>5439</S> for the suburbs<S>4054</S> thereof. <sup>suburbs: or, void places</sup>
And of this measure<S>4060</S> shalt thou measure<S>4058</S> the length<S>753</S> of five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S>, and the breadth<S>7341</S> of ten<S>6235</S> thousand<S>505</S>: and in it shall be the sanctuary<S>4720</S> and the most<S>6944</S> holy<S>6944</S> place.
The holy<S>6944</S> portion of the land<S>776</S> shall be for the priests<S>3548</S> the ministers<S>8334</S> of the sanctuary<S>4720</S>, which shall come near<S>7131</S> to minister<S>8334</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>: and it shall be a place<S>4725</S> for their houses<S>1004</S>, and an holy place<S>4720</S> for the sanctuary<S>4720</S>.
And the five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S> of length<S>753</S>, and the ten<S>6235</S> thousand<S>505</S> of breadth<S>7341</S>, shall also the Levites<S>3881</S>, the ministers<S>8334</S> of the house<S>1004</S>, have for themselves, for a possession<S>272</S> for twenty<S>6242</S> chambers<S>3957</S>.
And ye shall appoint<S>5414</S> the possession<S>272</S> of the city<S>5892</S> five<S>2568</S> thousand<S>505</S> broad<S>7341</S>, and five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S> long<S>753</S>, over against<S>5980</S> the oblation<S>8641</S> of the holy<S>6944</S> portion: it shall be for the whole house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>.
And a portion shall be for the prince<S>5387</S> on the one side and on the other side of the oblation<S>8641</S> of the holy<S>6944</S> portion, and of the possession<S>272</S> of the city<S>5892</S>, before<S>6440</S> the oblation<S>8641</S> of the holy<S>6944</S> portion, and before<S>6440</S> the possession<S>272</S> of the city<S>5892</S>, from the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S> westward<S>3220</S>, and from the east<S>6924</S> side<S>6285</S> eastward<S>6921</S>: and the length<S>753</S> shall be over against<S>5980</S> one<S>259</S> of the portions<S>2506</S>, from the west<S>3220</S> border<S>1366</S> unto the east<S>6921</S> border<S>1366</S>.
In the land<S>776</S> shall be his possession<S>272</S> in Israel<S>3478</S>: and my princes<S>5387</S> shall no more oppress<S>3238</S> my people<S>5971</S>; and the rest of the land<S>776</S> shall they give<S>5414</S> to the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> according to their tribes<S>7626</S>.
Thus saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Let it suffice<S>7227</S> you, O princes<S>5387</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: remove<S>5493</S> violence<S>2555</S> and spoil<S>7701</S>, and execute<S>6213</S> judgment<S>4941</S> and justice<S>6666</S>, take away<S>7311</S> your exactions<S>1646</S> from my people<S>5971</S>, saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>. <sup>exactions: Heb. expulsions</sup>
Ye shall have just<S>6664</S> balances<S>3976</S>, and a just<S>6664</S> ephah<S>374</S>, and a just<S>6664</S> bath<S>1324</S>.
The ephah<S>374</S> and the bath<S>1324</S> shall be of one<S>259</S> measure<S>8506</S>, that the bath<S>1324</S> may contain<S>5375</S> the tenth part<S>4643</S> of an homer<S>2563</S>, and the ephah<S>374</S> the tenth part<S>6224</S> of an homer<S>2563</S>: the measure<S>4971</S> thereof shall be after the homer<S>2563</S>.
And the shekel<S>8255</S> shall be twenty<S>6242</S> gerahs<S>1626</S>: twenty<S>6242</S> shekels<S>8255</S>, five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> shekels<S>8255</S>, fifteen<S>2568</S> <S>6235</S> shekels<S>8255</S>, shall be your maneh<S>4488</S>.
This is the oblation<S>8641</S> that ye shall offer<S>7311</S>; the sixth part<S>8345</S> of an ephah<S>374</S> of an homer<S>2563</S> of wheat<S>2406</S>, and ye shall give the sixth part<S>8341</S> of an ephah<S>374</S> of an homer<S>2563</S> of barley<S>8184</S>:
Concerning the ordinance<S>2706</S> of oil<S>8081</S>, the bath<S>1324</S> of oil<S>8081</S>, ye shall offer the tenth part<S>4643</S> of a bath<S>1324</S> out of the cor<S>3734</S>, which is an homer<S>2563</S> of ten<S>6235</S> baths<S>1324</S>; for ten<S>6235</S> baths<S>1324</S> are an homer<S>2563</S>:
And one<S>259</S> lamb<S>7716</S> out of the flock<S>6629</S>, out of two hundred<S>3967</S>, out of the fat pastures<S>4945</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>; for a meat offering<S>4503</S>, and for a burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and for peace offerings<S>8002</S>, to make reconciliation<S>3722</S> for them, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>. <sup>lamb: or, kid</sup> <sup>peace: or, thank offerings</sup>
All the people<S>5971</S> of the land<S>776</S> shall give this oblation<S>8641</S> for the prince<S>5387</S> in Israel<S>3478</S>. <sup>shall: Heb. shall be for</sup> <sup>for: or, with</sup>
And it shall be the prince's part<S>5387</S> to give burnt offerings<S>5930</S>, and meat offerings<S>4503</S>, and drink offerings<S>5262</S>, in the feasts<S>2282</S>, and in the new moons<S>2320</S>, and in the sabbaths<S>7676</S>, in all solemnities<S>4150</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: he shall prepare<S>6213</S> the sin offering<S>2403</S>, and the meat offering<S>4503</S>, and the burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and the peace offerings<S>8002</S>, to make reconciliation<S>3722</S> for the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>. <sup>peace: or, thank offerings</sup>
Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; In the first<S>7223</S> month, in the first<S>259</S> day of the month<S>2320</S>, thou shalt take<S>3947</S> a young<S>1121</S> <S>1241</S> bullock<S>6499</S> without blemish<S>8549</S>, and cleanse<S>2398</S> the sanctuary<S>4720</S>:
And the priest<S>3548</S> shall take<S>3947</S> of the blood<S>1818</S> of the sin offering<S>2403</S>, and put<S>5414</S> it upon the posts<S>4201</S> of the house<S>1004</S>, and upon the four<S>702</S> corners<S>6438</S> of the settle<S>5835</S> of the altar<S>4196</S>, and upon the posts<S>4201</S> of the gate<S>8179</S> of the inner<S>6442</S> court<S>2691</S>.
And so thou shalt do<S>6213</S> the seventh<S>7651</S> day of the month<S>2320</S> for every one<S>376</S> that erreth<S>7686</S>, and for him that is simple<S>6612</S>: so shall ye reconcile<S>3722</S> the house<S>1004</S>.
In the first<S>7223</S> month, in the fourteenth<S>702</S> <S>6240</S> day<S>3117</S> of the month<S>2320</S>, ye shall have the passover<S>6453</S>, a feast<S>2282</S> of seven<S>7620</S> days<S>3117</S>; unleavened bread<S>4682</S> shall be eaten<S>398</S>.
And upon that day<S>3117</S> shall the prince<S>5387</S> prepare<S>6213</S> for himself and for all the people<S>5971</S> of the land<S>776</S> a bullock<S>6499</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>.
And seven<S>7651</S> days<S>3117</S> of the feast<S>2282</S> he shall prepare<S>6213</S> a burnt offering<S>5930</S> to the LORD<S>3068</S>, seven<S>7651</S> bullocks<S>6499</S> and seven<S>7651</S> rams<S>352</S> without blemish<S>8549</S> daily<S>3117</S> the seven<S>7651</S> days<S>3117</S>; and a kid<S>8163</S> of the goats<S>5795</S> daily<S>3117</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>.
And he shall prepare<S>6213</S> a meat offering<S>4503</S> of an ephah<S>374</S> for a bullock<S>6499</S>, and an ephah<S>374</S> for a ram<S>352</S>, and an hin<S>1969</S> of oil<S>8081</S> for an ephah<S>374</S>.
In the seventh<S>7651</S> month, in the fifteenth<S>2568</S> <S>6240</S> day<S>3117</S> of the month<S>2320</S>, shall he do<S>6213</S> the like in the feast<S>2282</S> of the seven<S>7637</S> days<S>3117</S>, according to the sin offering<S>2403</S>, according to the burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and according to the meat offering<S>4503</S>, and according to the oil<S>8081</S>.
